title: Best of The Program | Guest: Rep. Thomas Massie | 8/7/20
description:
Glenn tested negative for the coronavirus and has had enough of quarantine. But is he ready to return to the studio? Joe Biden claimed the black community isn’t diverse, unlike Latinos, and Trump claimed Biden is “against God.” If Biden is elected, who will really be calling the shots? Rep. Thomas Massie discusses the next stimulus bill, what a dollar collapse looks like, rumors that the intel community is spying on Congress, and his new HBO documentary, “The Swamp.”
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
